snippet.title: SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream — Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The battle that spans time and cyberspace begins in SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream.

💥Online play with up to 20 players to take on Co-Op Quests, Boss Raids, and Free Roam
💥 21 characters of heroes and villains from across SAO’s history
💥 6 different classes to choose from, each with their own battlefield roles
💥 Enhance characters by collecting and upgrading a variety of weapons and accessories
💥 Customize the appearance of each character with cosmetics and decorations
💥 A single-player Story mode featuring a brand-new scenario written for the game

SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and Steam!

Get it today: https://www.bandainamcoent.com/games/sword-art-online-fractured-daydream

Worlds collide. Heroes unite.
SWORD ART ONLINE characters from across time and cyberspace team up in 20-player raiding parties to face powerful enemies. Choose your character, gather your allies, and push forward to victory!

#SWORDARTONLINE #FracturedDaydream
Follow Sword Art Games:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/saogames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/saogames/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/swordartonlinegames/

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment America:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
